body.name: White 2-piece Elongated Toilet with Standard 12-in Rough-in, ELLAI Powerful Single Flush 1.28 GPF ADA Chair Height Toilet (Seat Included)
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: 【Comfortable Chair Height Toilet】ADA Compliant. Features 16.5" height from floor to seat. comfortable height seating. Ideal for the elderly and individuals with disabilities which makes sitting down and standing up easier.
【Water Saving and Powerful Flush】Siphon Flushing. Single Flush 1.28 GPF. Fully-glazed 2" trapway and 3” flush value for effective flush. Super-quiet and powerful flush with no clogs. Leak-proof.
【Map Flush 1000 Grams】Great Maximum Performance Flush score of 1000 grams, meets Water Sense criteria. Use at least 20% less water than standard 1.6 GPF toilets.

【Stylish & Modern Design】The elongated bowl provides added space for comfort. The toilet fits into 12 inch rough-in and has a left-hand trip lever. Great for apartments, bathrooms, and suitable for any bathroom décor.

【Easy Installation】Package includes toilet, pre-installed toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, high-quality wax ring, floor bolts, and also installation instruction. Floor Mounted. All you need are a few hours and a plumber.

【Warranty】ELLAI toilets are warranted to be free of defects for one year from the date. One-year Limited warranty on flushing mechanism and toilet seat lid. Lifetime after-sale service, respond to messages in 24 hours online.
body.description: ELLAI White Single Flush Two Piece Toilets MT-43202P Two-piece elongated comfort height white toilet provides a powerful 1.28 GPF. The comfort height on this toilet is ADA certified which means it is ideal for the elderly and individuals with disabilities. With an easy to handle 2-piece construction, 12-in standard rough-in, and single lever flush handle, this toilet comes with everything needed for installation. And if that is not enough, this WaterSense certified toilet also helps to save water.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ELLAI White Single Flush Two Piece Toilets MT-43202P Two-piece elongated comfort height white toilet provides a powerful 1.28 GPF. The comfort height on this toilet is ADA certified which means it is ideal for the elderly and individuals with disabilities. With an easy to handle 2-piece construction, 12-in standard rough-in, and single lever flush handle, this toilet comes with everything needed for installation. And if that is not enough, this WaterSense certified toilet also helps to save water. None Yellowing Glaze ELLAI TWO PIECE Toilets have three layers of glaze, which is very resistant to dirt and can withstand the test of time, even after years of use is still shiny as new and easy to clean. Single Flush 1.28 GPF Use at least 20% less water than standard 1.6 GPF toilets.Watersense certificated;Great Maximum Performance Flush score of 1000 grams Extra Tall Seat Height 16.5" seat height offers chair comfort height that makes sitting down and standing up easier. Ideal for the elderly and individuals with disabilities.

Elongated Toilet Seat The elongated bowl provides added space for comfort. Great for apartments, bathrooms, and suitable for any bathroom décor. Fully Skirted Design The toilet fits into 12 inch rough-in and has a left-hand trip lever.Made of high-grade ceramic, this toilet is sturdy enough to withstand heavy loads 200KG, and people who are extra-heavy can sit down with confidence. 2" Full Glazed Trapway Optimal flushing operation with a 3-in flush valve and 2-in fully glazed trapway for an effective flush.PowerWash rim scrubs bowl with each flush, super-quiet with no clogs. Leak-proof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great seller good product
reviews.reviewText: Item was delivered broken. Seller sent a replacement right away even though the return window was closed. Product is good for the money and the installation was very easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Toilet is of high quality and was easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality product
reviews.reviewText: I like the special design . Easier to keep clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The toilet came with everything needed to install. It works perfectly. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent toilet! Fantastic price!
reviews.reviewText: We have an elderly family member that moved in and the low toilet we had was difficult for them. I looked at the toilets available and did not want to spend $400-$600. This toilet was MUCH less and was a breeze to install. The only issue was that a couple of washers were missing, but I have a lot of parts, so it was no big deal. Highly recommend this toilet if you need a high seat model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: This toilet is amazing, AND great price. It flushes like a dream!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap hardware that doesn’t work
reviews.reviewText: The Toilet looks nice but the hardware that came with it has bad instructions and the hardware is cheap plastic that doesn’t seal properly and the toilet won’t stop leaking. Also the hose that came with it was not long enough so that didn’t work. Now we have to figure out how to fix this and we cannot get our money back. Do not buy this!!! It’s a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Old folks will like the height and quiet flush
reviews.reviewText: The toilet was complete with everything I need to install it.
